    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dejstvo ali mnenje (3)</string>
            <string language="en">Fact or opinion?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tatsache oder Meinung?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fait ou opinion ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fato ou opinião?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fatto o opinione?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονός ή άποψη;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Hecho u opinión?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec mora presoditi ali določena trditev pomeni dejstvo ali le mnenje.</string>
            <string language="en">Deciding if the given statement is fact or opinion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dejstvo</string>
            <string language="en">fact</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mnenje</string>
            <string language="en">opinion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entscheiden, wenn die gegebene Anweisung Tatsache oder 
Meinung ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décidant si le rapport donné est fait ou opinion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Decidindo-se se a indicação dada for fato ou opinião.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Decidendo se la data istruzione è fatto o opinione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόφαση εάν η δεδομένη δήλωση είναι γεγονός ή 
άποψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Decidiendo si la declaración dada es hecho u opinión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tatsache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meinung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fait</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">opinion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">opinião</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fatto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">opinione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεγονός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άποψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hecho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">opinión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
